name: IASCO Flight Training
about: IASCO Flight Training, established in 1971, is a premier flight training institution located in Redding, California. We specialize in providing individualized ab initio training for international airline-sponsored student pilots, helping them obtain FAA pilot certificates. Our programs include Private Pilot Certificate, Instrument Rating, Commercial Pilot Certificate, and Multi Engine Rating. Operating from Redding Municipal Airport, a Class D airport with an operating control tower and two runways, we offer a comprehensive aviation training environment. IASCO is FAA PART 141 APPROVED and CAAC APPROVED, and we are also developing a domestic flight training program for individual students pursuing professional pilot careers or individual certificates. With a focus on quality and expertise, IASCO Flight Training sets a high standard in aviation education.
services:
["Private Pilot License
Commercial Pilot License
Airline Transport Pilot
Flight Instructor (CFI / FI)
Flight Instructor - Instrument (CFII / IRI)
Multi-Crew Cooperation Course (MCC)
Instrument Rating (IR)
Multi-Engine Rating"]
